translated: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets) is a film directed by Chris Columbus, it was released in 2002.
original: Harry Potter et la Chambre des secrets (Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets) est un film réalisé par Chris Colombus, il est sorti en 2002.
